net.krotscheck.dfr

Class FileStreamEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.krotscheck.dfr.FileStreamEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilteringDataStream

    public final class FileStreamEncoder
extends Object
implements IFilteringDataStream
    This class provides a convenience class by which files may be quickly encoded. It uses the Java ServiceLoader to discover all appropriate implementations of IDataEncoder, and creates one based on your passed mimetype.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck
